attributes.action: Set up Safe Havens, to combat babies being abandoned, often to die of exposure.
attributes.additional_details: We have a duty to these children, and to the women who have to live with the consequences of abandoning a newborn to the elements.
attributes.background:
On average 50 newborn babies are abandoned in the U.K. every year, many dying from exposure, one this week being found dead floating in a canal. 
Safe Haven schemes/baby boxes allow babies to be surrendered safely.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573185
